content.question: Two satellites are in circular orbits around Earth. Satellite <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> has mass <math alttext="m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and an orbital radius of <math alttext="2 R sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="R sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> is the radius of Earth. Satellite <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> has mass <math alttext="2 m sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>m</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and an orbital radius of <math alttext="3 R sub E" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>R</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>E</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following correctly compares the magnitude <math alttext="F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of the force exerted by Earth on each satellite and the speed <math alttext="v " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> of each satellite?

choices.label: Force Speed<math alttext="F sub 1 is greater than F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="v sub 1 is greater than v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

Force Speed<math alttext="F sub 1 is greater than F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="v sub 2 is greater than v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

Force Speed<math alttext="F sub 2 is greater than F sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="v sub 1 is greater than v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

Force Speed<math alttext="F sub 2 is greater than F sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="v sub 2 is greater than v sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: Force Speed<math alttext="F sub 1 is greater than F sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math><math alttext="v sub 1 is greater than v sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mrow><mi>υ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
